transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: India Mart payment nahi kar rakha aapke months ke
Customer: Sir aapki na aawaz actually proper nahi hai shayad na bar bar kat rahi hai call
Executive: India Mart ne koi bill payment nahi kar rakha aapke months ka
Customer: Nahi nahi sir aisa kuch baat kar rahi hu
Executive: Main keh rahi hu sir agar possible hai to hum system pe connect kar le agar aur koi doubt hai aapko to
Customer: Mam doubt to aisa ye hai ki leads ka kuch kuch kar sakte hai to kar dijiye baki theek hai baki sab to samajh gaya hu aapko
Executive: Leads me sir sab kuch perfect hai kuch bhi aisa sach nahi hai jo maine aapke samne na kiya ho refund vagera kya de sakte hai aap log
Customer: Kya de sakte hai
Executive: Refund vagera mam
Executive: Refund kis liye sir aap already itna high active hai aapko kya refund chahiye
Customer: Mam band karna ho to
Executive: Band karne ka to sir as such option nahi hota until unless India Mart pe lead available nahi hai to koi as such refund process nahi hai
Executive: India Mart me aapke product line ki lead bhi available hai usme sari ideas aapko hamari team ke through milti hai
Executive: Mere se mil rahi hai aapke sath ji ne bhi connect kiya hoga report nahi de rahe aap customer ke condition financially condition kharab ho to
Executive: Sir it's not about financially condition na it's matlab aap financially stability ke liye aap India Mart se refund thodi na lenge ye to koi logic nahi hai
Customer: main nahi mam jo file jo tha humne ko diya bhi tha na mam
Executive: Aapki baat bilkul theek hai sir lekin aise nahi hota hai refund process until unless India Mart pe lead available nahi hai aapke product line me hamare pass acha khasa lead ka traffic hai wo aap bhi dekh rahe hai aap use bhi kar rahe hai aapko business bhi mila hai
Executive: Correct to refund ka to as such process nahi hai sir aap ye check kariye na sir aap us pe focus kariye ki aap kitna lead matlab convert kar pa rahe hain uske through aap apni financially condition ko strong kar sakte hain
Customer: India kuch nahi dega humko
Executive: Nahi sir India Mart refund process nahi karega
Customer: mere ko fir court me jana padega fir mere ko
Executive: Sorry
Customer: mujhe court me apply karna padega fir
Executive: Sir aisa nahi aapko karna kyu hai sir aap itna jyada dissatisfied hai kya services pe
Customer: isliye na mam
Executive: Main ek kam karti hu kyuki maine to sir apni taraf se sari cheeze check on kar li hai aisa sach kuch bhi nahi bacha hai aap chahe to ek bar hum log main mere manager ek bar aap hum log teeno video meet pe connect karke jo bhi issues hai aap ek bar discuss kar lijiyega mere manager bhi honge usme available hai koi issue nahi hai aap aisa to lunch kar lijiyega
Executive: Sorry
Customer: Lunch work kar lijiye mam
Executive: Lunch ke baad kar lu
Customer: ha ji ha
Executive: Kis time pe
Customer: 3 o clock mam
Executive: Sorry
Customer: 3 o clock mam
Executive: 3 o clock chaliye main 3 o clock aapko connect karti hu sir aap system pe rahiyega theek hai
Customer: Okay mam
Executive: Okay
Customer: Thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to financial issues.

- Claims IndiaMART is not providing enough leads.



Resolution:

- Explained no refund process unless leads unavailable.

- Suggested focusing on lead conversion.

- Offered a video meet with manager to discuss issues.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet scheduled for 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, leads, financial condition, video meet
